html.p: Contains the user documentation that is distributed with NewsAgent.

Contains javadoc for NewsAgent. This is useful for developers. Like me, for instance. The API documentation here is for the latest release version of NewsAgent. Javadoc for NewsAgent is generated nightly by the build process and can be found in the development section.
